props.placeholder: What are your fitness goals? (e.g., weight loss, muscle gain, strength, endurance, general fitness...)
What equipment do you have access to? (e.g., dumbbells, resistance bands, gym membership, bodyweight only...)
How many days per week can you work out? What days work best for you?
Any injuries, physical limitations, or areas to avoid?
Any specific preferences? (e.g., prefer cardio, hate burpees, love functional movements...)

translations.name: Workout Routine Builder
translations.description: Creates personalized workout plans based on fitness goals and equipment. Balances muscle groups, includes rest days, provides progression guidance with safety considerations and modifications for limitations.
translations.instructions:
1. Define your fitness goals
2. List available equipment
3. Specify schedule availability
4. Choose experience level
5. Set time per session
6. Note any physical limitations (optional)
7. Add workout preferences (optional)

The builder will create:
- Personalized workout split and schedule
- Exercise selection based on equipment
- Sets, reps, and rest recommendations
- Warm-up and cool-down routines
- Progressive overload plan
- Safety considerations and modifications
- Success tips and tracking guidance

Perfect for fitness beginners, experienced athletes, and anyone looking for structured workout programming.
